word_group.brief_definition: 失业福利；失业津贴；失业补助
失业保险；失业保险金；失业保险费
解决失业问题；失业治理
周期性失业；循环性失业
失业和动荡；失业和骚乱

bilingual.source: Many people are struggling due to unemployment.
bilingual.target: 许多人因为失业而挣扎。
经济危机恶化了失业率。

bilingual.source: High unemployment rates can lead to social unrest.
bilingual.target: 高失业率可能导致社会动荡。

bilingual.source: The rising unemployment rate worries many people.
bilingual.target: 失业率上升让很多人感到担忧。

bilingual.source: He faced unemployment because his company went bankrupt.
bilingual.target: 他因为公司倒闭而失业了。

bilingual.source: The economic crisis has caused a rise in unemployment.
bilingual.target: 经济危机导致了失业率上升。

bilingual.source: The economic crisis exacerbated the unemployment problem.
bilingual.target: 经济危机加剧了失业问题。

bilingual.source: The unemployment rate dropped by three percentage points.
bilingual.target: 失业率下降了三个百分点。

list.abstract: unemployment是一个英语单词，名词，作名词时意为“失业；失业率；失业人数”。

yingyinNormal.en: So when unemployment went down, they expected inflation and demanded higher wages, causing unemployment to go back up while inflation remained high.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此当失业率下降时，人们也会开始期待通货膨胀以及加薪，造成失业率回去原本的水平，而通货膨胀的现象依旧存在着。

yingyinNormal.en: For the first time in six years, the unemployment rate is below 6 percent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 六年以来的第一次失业率降低到6%以下。

yingyinNormal.en: Which is what happened in the 1970s when both inflation and unemployment rose.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是70年代的状况，通货膨胀和失业率同时上升。

yingyinNormal.en: The unemployment rate fell to under six percent for the first time in more than six years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 失业率在六年多以来第一次下降到6%以下。

yingyinNormal.en: Shoring up the economy, securing our nation from ICO and reducing unemployment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 提振经济，保护我国不受哈里发国攻击还要降低失业率。

yingyinNormal.en: Hi, everybody. For the first time in more than 6 years the unemployment rate is below 6%.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家好。6年多以来的第一次失业率降到了6%以下。

yingyinNormal.en: We've reduced the unemployment rate from 10% in October of 2009 to 6.1% today.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们将失业率从2009年10月的10%降低到今天的6.1%。

yingyinNormal.en: So to avoid the misery of unemployment, the government should instead spend money to create jobs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此为了避免失业带来的伤痛，政府增加支出来创造工作机会。

yingyinNormal.en: The unemployment rate for those with a bachelor's degree is less than one-third of the rate for those without a high school diploma.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拥有本科学历人员的失业率比没有高中学历的人要低三分之一。

yingyinNormal.en: In Washington DC alone, we've managed to reduce unemployment by over a third and put 25,000 people to work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 光是在华盛顿特区，我们就将失业率削减了超过三分之一，两万五千人找到了工作。

yingyinNormal.en: Then in the '90s unemployment dropped while inflation stayed low, which all rather took the bend out of Phillips' curve.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接着在90年代，失业率下降，而通货膨胀依旧保持在很低的水平，像是摆脱了菲利浦曲线的限制。

yingyinNormal.en: And likewise, when unemployment is high, the lack of money to spend means that inflation goes down. This became known as the Phillips Curve.
yingyinNormal.zh: 反之，当失业率高涨时，较低的消费支出也代表通货膨胀的消退。这就是十分知名的菲利浦曲线。

yingyinNormal.en: Say, for example, the Eurozone tries to lower its interest rate and reduce unemployment. Money flows out to earn higher interest rates elsewhere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 举例来说，欧元使用区试着想要降低利率来减少失业。这样资金就会流到别的国家来争取更高的利率。

yingyinNormal.en: The Fed uses vast amounts of economic data to determine how much currency should be in circulation, including previous rates of inflation, international trends, and the unemployment rate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 联准会透过大量的经济数据来决定流通的货币数量，这些数据包括过去的通膨率，国际趋势以及失业率。

yingyinNormal.en: The Fed uses vast amounts of economic data to determine how much currency should be in circulation, including previous rates of inflation, international trends, and the unemployment rate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 联准会透过大量的经济数据来决定流通的货币数量，这些数据包括过去的通膨率，国际趋势以及失业率。

yingyinNormal.en: Whereas if the government tightens its belt when people and businesses are doing the same, less is spent, so unemployment gets even worse. That is the paradox of thrift.
yingyinNormal.zh: 若政府勒紧腰带，而民众及公司行号也一样不想花钱，支出就会下降，失业问题也会变得更严重。这就是节俭的矛盾。

yingyinNormal.en: And even if this new technology destroys jobs, wages will drop and businesses hire more people, so unemployment falls again. Simple, at least in the long run.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而即使这样的新科技可能会减少一些工作岗位、降低薪水，但新创产业会雇用更多人，因此失业率还是会下降。道理很简单，至少长期看来是这样没错。

yingyinNormal.en: But deflation would make people want to hold onto their money, and a decrease in consumer spending would reduce business profits, leading to more unemployment and a further decrease in spending, causing the economy to keep shrinking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，通货紧缩会让人不愿花钱，减少消费支出，造成商业利润下跌，失业率升高，进一步重挫消费，导致经济不断紧缩。

yingyinNormal.en: But deflation would make people want to hold onto their money, and a decrease in consumer spending would reduce business profits, leading to more unemployment and a further decrease in spending, causing the economy to keep shrinking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，通货紧缩会让人不愿花钱，减少消费支出，造成商业利润下跌，失业率升高，进一步重挫消费，导致经济不断紧缩。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Many people talked of the drop in the <highlight>unemployment</highlight> rate to 6.1 percent, as good news.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多人认为失业率下降到6.1%是好消息。

examination_example.sentence: You can insure yourself against the risk of <highlight>unemployment</highlight> and receive unconditional payments if the disaster happens.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果发生灾难，你能为自己投保失业险和得到无条件赔付。

examination_example.sentence: Many said that <highlight>unemployment</highlight>, while extremely painful, had improved them in some ways.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多人说尽管失业是极其痛苦的一件事，但是也在某些方面也让他们有所提升。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the number or proportion of unemployed people

examination_example.sentence: The researchers found that both demographic factors and environmental factors, such as long-term <highlight>unemployment</highlight> rates, were more correlated with cultural values than nationality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员发现，人口因素和环境因素（如长期失业率）与文化价值观的相关性大于国籍。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Mr. Somavia says the International Labour Organization is proposing a global job's agreement to deal with <highlight>unemployment</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 索马维亚先生说，国际劳工组织正在拟定一项全球就业协议来解决失业问题。

sense_info_list.en: the number or proportion of unemployed people

examination_example.sentence: And based on past experiences, it takes four to five years after economic recovery for <highlight>unemployment</highlight> to return to pre-crisis levels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据过去的经验，经济复苏后，失业率需要四到五年才能恢复到危机前的水平。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
